Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Data Skeleton is a specialized data preparation team focused on structuring, cleaning, and optimizing scientific datasets for research and machine learning applications. The team collaborates with academic and industry partners to ensure data integrity, accessibility, and analytical readiness. With expertise across domains, Data Skeleton bridges raw data and actionable insights.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The Human Connectome Project (HCP) provides large-scale, high-quality neuroimaging datasets aimed at mapping human brain connectivity across the lifespan. Key datasets include HCP-Young Adult (YA), HCP-Development (D), HCP-Aging (A), and HCP-Baby (B), covering individuals from infancy to old age. These datasets include structural MRI, functional MRI (resting and task-based), diffusion imaging, and behavioral assessments. They serve as valuable resources for neuroscience, cognitive science, and brain development research.
